amendment.description: An amendment numbered 455 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to add the text of the Colorado Outdoor Recreation and Economy Act and the Grand Canyon Protection Act to the bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds the text of the Colorado Outdoor Recreation and Economy Act and the Grand Canyon Protection Act to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A040) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 201 (Roll no. 345).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A040) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Neguse.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A040) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 201 (Roll no. 345).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A040) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 201 (Roll no. 345).
